refnamediv.refpurpose: Plot the function value of an optimization algorithm

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function creates and updates a plot of the function value, depending on the number of iterations. It is a pre-defined plot function which should be used as an option of the "PlotFcns" option.

refsection.title: Example
refsection.para: In the following example, we use the optimplotfval function for use with the fminsearch function.
